_description: Four couplets on the conveyance of the book as a pledge to a brother and sister-in-law.

VanKampen.First Lines:
Keep well this in weddvnto I bryng home your
                    bedd…
VanKampen.Last Lines:
…to & vnto my systir your wyfgod geef yow both goode heele
                    & lyf
VanKampen.Note: Written vericially in the left margin.
VanKampen.Editions:
O’Sullivan,  Orlaith,  and  Helen Conrad-O’Briain.  
             “The Book as Pledge: A Fifteenth-Century Verse in VK MS 678.” 
             Journal of the Early Book Society
         3 (2000): 210-15: 210-11.
